name: Mission Twentyeight
description:
Mission Twentyeight Is an action platformer based in the middle of a cyberpunk war. An unknown military force has captured your city and taken your friends as hostage, it's your job to save your friends and sabotage the military force in order to increase your chances of coming out victorious.

Mission Twentyeight features multiple areas, all with their own unique style and respective enemies. Explore your way through each area filled with a lot of action and puzzle solving, along with their own respective boss fights which takes you through unique boss stages that's sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

.

Mission Twentyeight

Was developed in under 30 days as a part of a challenge to make a commercial game in one month. Keep that in mind when considering the purchase. With that being said I do hope this game will keep you entertained for as long as possible. It's been a huge learning experience developing this, especially in the short amount of time.
